actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 1739 ordered to be reported.

official_title: A bill to modify the project for navigation at Houston Ship Channel (Greens Bayou), Texas, to maintain a forty-foot depth in Greens Bayou.

summary.text: Modifies the navigation project at the Houston Ship Channel, Texas, to maintain a 40-foot depth in Greens Bayou.

titles.title: A bill to modify the project for navigation at Houston Ship Channel (Greens Bayou), Texas, to maintain a forty-foot depth in Greens Bayou.
